'''A Brush of Seafoam and Crimson''' is the first act of [[Ancient Colors]].

==Quests==
# [[The Illusion's Finishings]]

==Summary==
;The Illusion's Finishings
The traveler meets some [[Eremites]] and a Melusine named [[Mamere]]. Following Mamere underwater, they enter the underground world of the [[Merusea Village]] where the Melusines live. Mamere shows the traveler around the village as well as her house, canvas paintings, and [[Seymour]]. They also help collect "paint" for Mamere. Back at her house, they encounter the Eremites again along with a man named [[Jakob]]. They then work on fixing Seymour.
